smartgov.models.lez.agent.actuator

Class PollutantCarMover

  • java.lang.Object
    • smartgov.urban.osm.agent.actuator.CarMover
      • smartgov.models.lez.agent.actuator.PollutantCarMover
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeoMover

    public class PollutantCarMover
extends CarMover
    This class implements the same behavior has the CarMover, but it had utilities to compute pollution emissions. To do so, it records the traveled distance and propagate the pollution on crossed arcs each time a distance treshold has been reached. Must also be parameterized with constants used by the COPERT model. (TODO: Or maybe this should be included in a new AgentBody extension?)
